categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ryvus was a male Human Sith Lord who served the resurgent Sith Empire during the Galactic War against the Galactic Republic.

In 3642 BBY, he was stationed on Taris when the Jedi began training Tarisian settlers to form a militia and defend themselves against the Empire. Hoping to defeat them, he tasked an Imperial spacer to destroy the Jedi and the Tarisian Militia Forces.
